Version 1.7.99 - Company Access Fixes

Bug Fixes

  • Manual disable now persists: When superadmin unchecks a company to disable it, it stays disabled regardless of expiry date setting
  • Expiry date cleared on disable: Disabled companies no longer retain expiry dates (no sense in expiry for disabled company)
  • Valid expiry enables company: Setting a new expiry date (today or future) on a disabled company will enable it
  • Timezone fix: Expiry dates now display correctly regardless of Moodle's timezone setting (previously showed next day in some timezones like Australia/Perth)

Technical Changes

  • New set_company_expiry_date_only() function for updating expiry without triggering enable/disable
  • JavaScript date conversion now uses local timezone instead of UTC
  • PHP date display uses userdate() for consistent timezone handling

Previous Versions

  • v1.7.98: Correct OAuth2 defaults (issuer=backend, origins=frontend)
  • v1.7.97: Default CSP includes both inbox and api-inbox domains
